body.p: In December 2008, the boards published for public comment the Discussion Paper Preliminary Views on Revenue Recognition in Contracts with Customers and received more than 200 comment letters in response. In the Discussion Paper, the boards proposed the general principles of a contract-based revenue recognition model with a measurement approach that was based on an allocation of the transaction price. That revenue recognition model was developed after extensive discussions by the boards on alternative models for recognising and measuring revenue (see paragraphs BC16–BC27).
